meanings.definition: Having the ovary situated around the base of the floral parts.
meanings.sent1: The perigynous flowers in the garden were beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The perigynous plants in the park attracted many bees.
meanings.sent3: The perigynous blooms seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her perigynous personality made her the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The perigynous arrangement of petals created a stunning display.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a flower with the ovary positioned below the sepals, petals, and stamens.
meanings.sent1: The perigynous blossoms in the field were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: Bees were drawn to the perigynous flowers due to their unique structure.
